dmca.title: [EV1-C1883702Q] DMCA Report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net]

Dear Sir, 
 
1. The copyrighted work at issue [Password Sentry] is the web
application that is installed here: 
 
http://www.acmebondage.com/cgi-bin/q01t55fHnP/
http://asiangirlsinbikinis.com/cgi-bin/pxEBZzk6u8/
http://www.beautifulladyboys.com/cgi-bin/SoX5R3rpGG/
http://beautifultranssexuals.com/cgi-bin/jjACpC4TPW/
http://www.bitchesonbitches.com/cgi-bin/ZSVEYhSXBL/
http://www.fuckingasianbitches.com/cgi-bin/ZCn1Bls6Ud/
http://www.fuckingjapbitches.com/cgi-bin/0bT3U9Nxxx/
http://www.fuckingpregnantbitches.com/cgi-bin/CiwQOl0fHP/
http://www.intruderbondage.com/cgi-bin/aqEf864ze/
http://www.thehypnosisoffice.com/cgi-bin/wIvpx4jUqw/ 
 
- there may be others on one or more servers. 
- he has and continues to install an old version of Password Sentry (PS)
that does contain a security vulnerability that may be exploited by
hackers that may disrupt the server (including any domains on that
server, whether a dedicated / co-located or shared / virtual server). 
 
2. My Contact Information: support@monster-submit.com 
 
3. Infringer's Contact Information: Bruce B Thomas (according to our
billing records for the ONE domain he purchased a Password Sentry
license for) 
 
4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
 
5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Daniel Abrams, Principal
Virtual Solutions
